gate.alignment.gui.actions.impl
Class FeatureTransferrerAction

java.lang.Object
  gate.alignment.gui.actions.impl.FeatureTransferrerAction
All Implemented Interfaces:
FinishedAlignmentAction
public class FeatureTransferrerAction
extends Object
implements FinishedAlignmentAction

This actions is useful for transferring features from source annotations to the respective aligned target annotations. User need to provide names of features to transfer. If none provided, all features are transferred.

Author:
niraj
